ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: reguarding the throwing slot, i think your best bet for this slot is the runed bone fork off squire in upper guk, i dunno the level of him but he s pretty easy
ygData.messageBody:
reguarding the throwing slot, i think your best bet for this slot is the
runed bone fork off squire in upper guk, i dunno the level of him but he's
pretty easy in the 30s, definetly green. the 10 magic, fire and cold resist
are very welcomed.

like others have said, get shin pants and gloves in lower at the zone line,
they usually decay on corpses, i know i'll be running my little lev 6
warrior there soon to get some.

Rakka 49 necro
Minkin 36 bard
Tanqueray 6 warrior

Sol Ro


> >Small steel: greaves, boots
> Get Shin Greaves from Lower Guk, generally available for free if you ask
> as
> they are no drop. This will let you seel the steel greaves to buy steel
> somewhere else like arms.
>
> >Bracer of Erollisi Mar
> >Collar of undead protection
> >Elf hide gloves
> I'd say get the Shin gauntlets from Lower Guk here as well. Also
> generally
> available for free and near zone line to Upper. The AC will prolly be
> worth
> more than the stats.
>
> >Thick leather apron
> >Dragoon Dirk in my ranged slot
>
> Those are my suggestions. It becomes tougher to find things that are as
> good AC-wise as bronze without soaring into the high 100's of pp.
>
> Kit
>
